name: image-blur-tool
title: Image Blur Tool
description: Apply Gaussian blur effects to images
content:
Overview

This application applies a Gaussian blur effect to images for artistic or privacy purposes. Built using Pillow, it uses a high-quality Gaussian blur filter with configurable blur radius.

Features

  • Gaussian blur with adjustable radius (default: 5)
  • Preserves original file format
  • High-quality blur algorithm
  • Optimized output settings

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a blurred image with the suffix _blurred in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Creating artistic blur effects
  • Blurring backgrounds for privacy
  • Softening images for design work
  • Creating depth-of-field effects
command: rm -rf prod_apps || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_blur_tool.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -r 5
